alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 22 at 11:47PM AKDT until August 23 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will likely wash away. Waves could splash onto docks near Prudhoe Bay. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will increase tonight. By Wednesday morning west winds gusting to 40 mph are expected which will continue through Wednesday afternoon. These winds will push waves high up the beach to near the vegetation line causing minor erosion and washing away items left on the beach. The worst conditions will be on west and northwest facing beaches. Winds and waves will decrease Wednesday evening.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
